activities.name: Get List of Files by Scope

dependsOn.activity: Get List of Files by Scope

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select [MBR_FileName] as MBRFileName, [MBR_Scope] as MBRScope,[MBR_Month] as MBRMonth
  ,[MBR_Currency_Code] as MBRCurrCode ,[MBR_BU_Code] as MBRBUCode ,[MBR_BU_Name] as MBRBUName ,[MBR_SheetName] as MBRSheetName from  [ods].[Sources_Config]

scriptLines: joinFactKPI derive(InsertOrUpdate = iif(isNull(factDriversClean@ScenarioID) && isNull(KPIID) && isNull(factDriversClean@OrganisationID) && isNull(factDriversClean@MonthYearID) ,
